00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup PDMA_Exported_Types PDMA exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Definition of PDMA channel Init Structure
00055  */
00056 typedef struct
00057 {
00058   u32 PDMACH_SrcAddr;         /*!< source address                                                           */
00059   u32 PDMACH_DstAddr;         /*!< destination address                                                      */
00060   u16 PDMACH_BlkCnt;          /*!< number of blocks for a PDMA transfer (1 ~ 65,535)                        */
00061   u8  PDMACH_BlkLen;          /*!< number of data for a block (1 ~ 255)                                     */
00062   u8  PDMACH_DataSize;        /*!< number of bits for a data (8-bit/16-bit/32-bit)                          */
00063   u16 PDMACH_Priority;        /*!< software priority for a PDMA transfer (L/M/H/VH)                         */
00064   u16 PDMACH_AdrMod;          /*!< address mode (LIN_INC/LIN_DEC/CIR_INC/CIR_DEC/FIX/AUTO_RELOAD)           */
00065 } PDMACH_InitTypeDef;
00066 /**
00067   * @}
00068   */
00069 
00070 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 /** @defgroup PDMA_Exported_Constants PDMA exported constants
00072   * @{
00073   */
00074 /* priority                                                                                                 */
00075 #define L_PRIO                    (0)                           /*!< low priority                           */
00076 #define M_PRIO                    (1UL << 8)                    /*!< medium priority                        */
00077 #define H_PRIO                    (2UL << 8)                    /*!< high priority                          */
00078 #define VH_PRIO                   (3UL << 8)                    /*!< very high priority                     */
00079 
00080 #define IS_PDMA_PRIO(PRIO)        ((PRIO >> 8) < 4)             /*!< check channel priority parameter       */
00081 
00082 /* address mode                                                                                             */
00083 #define AUTO_RELOAD               (1UL << 11)                   /*!< enable auto reload                     */
00084 #define ADR_FIX                   (1UL << 10)                   /*!< enable address fix                     */
00085 
00086 #define SRC_ADR_LIN_INC           (0)                           /*!< source address linear increment        */
00087 #define SRC_ADR_LIN_DEC           (1UL << 6)                    /*!< source address linear decrement        */
00088 #define SRC_ADR_CIR_INC           (2UL << 6)                    /*!< source address circular increment      */
00089 #define SRC_ADR_CIR_DEC           (3UL << 6)                    /*!< source address circular decrement      */
00090 #define SRC_ADR_FIX               (ADR_FIX | SRC_ADR_CIR_INC)   /*!< source address fix                     */
00091 
00092 #define DST_ADR_LIN_INC           (0)                           /*!< destination address linear increment   */
00093 #define DST_ADR_LIN_DEC           (1UL << 4)                    /*!< destination address linear decrement   */
00094 #define DST_ADR_CIR_INC           (2UL << 4)                    /*!< destination address circular increment */
00095 #define DST_ADR_CIR_DEC           (3UL << 4)                    /*!< destination address circular decrement */
00096 #define DST_ADR_FIX               (ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_CIR_INC)   /*!< destination address fix                */
00097 
00098 #define IS_PDMA_ADR_MOD(MOD)      ((MOD & 0xFFFFF30F) == 0)     /*!< check address mode parameters          */
00099 
00100 /* transfer size                                                                                            */
00101 #define IS_PDMA_BLK_CNT(CNT)      ((CNT > 0) && (CNT <= 65535))  /*!< block count per transfer               */
00102 #define IS_PDMA_BLK_LEN(LEN)      ((LEN > 0) && (LEN <= 255))    /*!< block size per block count             */
00103 
00104 /* transfer width                                                                                           */
00105 #define WIDTH_8BIT                (0)                           /*!< 8-bit transfer width                   */
00106 #define WIDTH_16BIT               (1UL << 2)                    /*!< 16-bit transfer width                  */
00107 #define WIDTH_32BIT               (2UL << 2)                    /*!< 32-bit transfer width                  */
00108 
00109 #define IS_PDMA_WIDTH(WIDTH)      ((WIDTH >> 2) < 3)            /*!< check transfer width parameter         */
00110 
00111 /* channel number                                                                                           */
00112 #define PDMA_CH0                  (0)                           /*!< channel 0 number                       */
00113 #define PDMA_CH1                  (1UL)                         /*!< channel 1 number                       */
00114 #define PDMA_CH2                  (2UL)                         /*!< channel 2 number                       */
00115 #define PDMA_CH3                  (3UL)                         /*!< channel 3 number                       */
00116 #define PDMA_CH4                  (4UL)                         /*!< channel 4 number                       */
00117 #define PDMA_CH5                  (5UL)                         /*!< channel 5 number                       */
00118 
00119 #define IS_PDMA_CH(CH)            (CH < 6)                      /*!< check channel number parameter         */
00120 
00121 #define PDMA_ADC0                 PDMA_CH0                      /*!< ADC PDMA channel number                */
00122 #if (LIBCFG_ADC1)
00123 #define PDMA_ADC1                 PDMA_CH1                      /*!< ADC PDMA channel number                */
00124 #endif
00125 #define PDMA_ADC                  PDMA_ADC0
00126 
00127 #if(LIBCFG_DAC0)

00129 #define PDMA_DAC0_CH1             PDMA_CH3                      /*!< DAC0 CH1 PDMA channel number           */
00130 #endif

00135 #endif

00320 
00321 /* flag                                                                                                     */
00322 #define PDMA_FLAG_GE              (1UL << 0)                    /*!< PDMA channel global event flag         */
00323 #define PDMA_FLAG_BE              (1UL << 1)                    /*!< PDMA channel block end flag            */
00324 #define PDMA_FLAG_HT              (1UL << 2)                    /*!< PDMA channel half transfer flag        */
00325 #define PDMA_FLAG_TC              (1UL << 3)                    /*!< PDMA channel transfer complete flag    */
00326 #define PDMA_FLAG_TE              (1UL << 4)                    /*!< PDMA channel transfer error flag       */
00327 
00328 #define IS_PDMA_FLAG(FLAG)        (((FLAG & 0xFFFFFFE0) == 0) && (FLAG != 0))
00329 #define IS_PDMA_CLEAR_FLAG(FLAG)  (((FLAG & 0xFFFFFFE0) == 0) && (FLAG != 0))
00330 
00331 /* interrupt                                                                                                */
00332 #define PDMA_INT_GE               (1UL << 0)                  /*!< PDMA channel global event interrupt      */
00333 #define PDMA_INT_BE               (1UL << 1)                  /*!< PDMA channel block end interrupt         */
00334 #define PDMA_INT_HT               (1UL << 2)                  /*!< PDMA channel half transfer interrupt     */
00335 #define PDMA_INT_TC               (1UL << 3)                  /*!< PDMA channel transfer complete interrupt */
00336 #define PDMA_INT_TE               (1UL << 4)                  /*!< PDMA channel transfer error interrupt    */
00337 
00338 #define IS_PDMA_INT(INT)          (((INT & 0xFFFFFFE0) == 0) && (INT != 0))
00339 /**
00340   * @}
00341   */

00351 void PDMA_DstAddrConfig(u32 PDMA_CHn, u32 DstAddr);

00353 void PDMA_EnaCmd(u32 PDMA_CHn, ControlStatus NewState);
00354 void PDMA_SwTrigCmd(u32 PDMA_CHn, ControlStatus NewState);
00355

00358 void PDMA_ClearFlag(u32 PDMA_CHn, u32 PDMA_FLAG_x);
